ogTitle: 18.04.26 one minute with the sign guys - smarther news

card_1.cardText:
2 Americans Who Want To Change The World…
-----------------------------------------

**…one sign at a time.**

[Watch Now](https://www.youtube.com/embed/od7KTuFACd0?enablejsapi=1&autoplay=1&rel=0)

card_10.cardText:
We loved talking to Greg Amaral and Wendell Walker about their passion to make a difference in this world! Special thanks to photographer Craig Michaud for his amazing photos. Read more of their story:

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-04-26/)
